comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be related to the collision in fog of the steamship Monroe and the Nantucket. Oscar Perkins is the name of an assistant engineer of the Monroe. See NYT of Jan 31, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0CE2DA1730E733A...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Robert Lee Etheridge was a wireless operator on the Monroe. He testified in the government enquiry. on Feb 18, 1914. So this is probably when the photo was taken. See NYT of Feb 19. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9901E7DD113FE633A...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you Swanq and Wystan for your research revealing the connection of these men to the collision of the Monroe and the Nantucket. We will add some of it to the record when we update.
